verbose_text: Therefore, using TK as a biomarker for proliferation, we observed that serum TK levels (XREF_FIG) were elevated for 4 weeks after the T-cell infusions and appeared to track with the presence of adoptively transferred T cells (study day 14 average : 24.8 +/- 8.3 U/L and study day 28 average : 49.2 +/- 18.5 U/L, n = 5).
